description.raw:
List of highlights of this patch:

* WAM-V urdf is a bit more modular as we use two new xacro macros:

    * engine: Let us insert any engine into a specific position.
    * main\_collisions: Create the simple collision elements from one side. We can take advantage of the symmetry of the model to create the other side automatically.
    
* The propeller is a different link connected with a continuous joint to the engine shaft. We can now spin the propellers.
* Thrust\_plugin modified to spin the propellers.

If you teleoperate the model, you should see the propellers spinning.

**Question**: I don’t have an intuition about the right directions to spin the propellers when moving forward. Let me know if I should flip the sign.

  • The propeller is a different link connected with a continuous joint to the engine shaft. We can now spin the propellers.

  • Thrust_plugin modified to spin the propellers.

If you teleoperate the model, you should see the propellers spinning.
